briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of Topical Recombinant Thrombin in Surgical Hemostasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Open-Label, Single-Group Immunogenicity and Safety Study of Topical Recombinant Thrombin (rThrombin) in Surgical Hemostasis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immune system response to recombinant thrombin when used to control bleeding in spinal and vascular surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Anti-recombinant Thrombin (rThrombin) Product Antibodies at Day 29 in Participants With and Without Anti-bovine Thrombin Product Antibodies at Baseline
